name: A Trip Out: Gone Wrong
description:
Gather food and avoid wildlife as you try and find your way home from a camping trip GONE WRONG

It might not be the prettiest (take it back you fool, i spent hours on those fancy transitions and fireflies) But this prototype is our first real go at making a game in unity, along with being our first game jam! We hope you enjoy our little world as much as we had fun learning how to make it!
